text: Collection buying tip if you're putting ads in local facebook groups: the good collections are ones people aren't looking to sell, but instead ones where someone sees a post and thinks "I've got a shoebox of those from 1998 in my closet. May as well see if I can get 20 bucks." As such, you need to have your ad show up when they're online casually scrolling through stuff. I've had really good luck during both our last snow storms because people are home on their butts watching tv and fucking about on laptops or phones. I posted one last night and I've got 4 meetings set up this week to look at collections.
